name: api-check
installCommand: sed -E -i 's#https://r(2)?\.cnpmjs\.org#https://registry.npmjs.org#g' yarn.lock || true && npm config set registry https://registry.npmjs.org && yarn config set registry https://registry.npmjs.org && env -u NPM_CONFIG_REGISTRY -u npm_config_registry -u YARN_REGISTRY yarn install --frozen-lockfile --network-timeout 600000 --verbose
